Package cz.cuni.mff.mozharon.financialaccounting.infrastructure.repositories

Class InMemoryRecordRepository

java.lang.Object
cz.cuni.mff.mozharon.financialaccounting.infrastructure.repositories.InMemoryRecordRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
RecordRepositoryInterface
public class InMemoryRecordRepository extends Object implements RecordRepositoryInterface
In-memory implementation of the RecordRepositoryInterface, managing records storage.

    • createRecord

      public Record createRecord(int id, Double amount, String description, DateAndTime dateAndTime, Category category, RecordType recordType) throws InvalidAmountException
      Creates a new record with provided details and stores it in the repository.
      Specified by:
      createRecord in interface RecordRepositoryInterface
      Parameters:
      id - the ID for the new record
      amount - the amount for the new record
      description - the description for the new record
      dateAndTime - the date and time for the new record
      category - the category for the new record
      recordType - the type of the record
      Returns:
      the newly created record
      Throws:
      InvalidAmountException - if the amount is invalid (e.g., negative)

    • findById

      public Optional<Record> findById(Long id)
      Finds a record by its ID.
      Specified by:
      findById in interface RecordRepositoryInterface
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the record to find
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the found record, or an empty Optional if no record is found
